tool_description: Access all of the Urban Dictionary, the one-stop shop for slang definitions
title: Urban Dictionary

api_list.name: Define a Word / Search
api_list.description: Can be used to define a specific word, or search for word defintions

api_list.name: Random Word
api_list.description: Returns a list of random words & definitions from the Urban Dictionary database
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://urban-dictionary7.p.rapidapi.com/v0/random"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "urban-dictionary7.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Word of the Day
api_list.description: Gets the Word of the Day for the past 10 days, including today.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://urban-dictionary7.p.rapidapi.com/v0/words_of_the_day"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "urban-dictionary7.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
